frontmatter.announcement: Announcing EIP-712 support! See our mobile and library release notes https://developer.uport.me/releases for details.

node.name: Production Release
node.description:
- Camera now autoscans QR code and is disabled fully when not visible
- Performance improvements & bugfixes

node.name: Production Release
node.description:
Verification requests now expire using the expires in value defined for the request.
Update to Caleuche URL for backups

node.description:

node.name: Version 1.1.11
node.description: - Added ability to specify `brandColor` param that can be used by uport mobile app to style requests from your app.  (Note: this feature has not yet been released in the mobile app, will update with the version number when it does)

node.name: Version 1.1.9
node.description: - Minor bug fixes related to Infura URLs

node.name: Version 1.2.1
node.description: - Added support for `rexp` param to specify expiration period for claim signed by verification signature request

node.name: Version 1.2.0
node.description:
- Converted to typescript
- Allow developers to specify more detailed conditions and information within a selective disclosure request using the new [Verifiable Claims Spec](https://github.com/uport-project/uport-credentials/blob/develop/docs/reference/index.md#verifiable-claims-spec)
